items.name: Rejuvenation
entries: 如果被摧毁，瓦片生物会恢复所有的命中率，并在24小时内再次变得活跃，除非至少有一半的瓦片被收集起来，并与该生物的其他瓦片分开保存。

items.name: Narrow Dodge
entries: 当受到近战攻击时，瓦片上的生物可以做出反应，将其最狭窄的一面转向攻击者。攻击者在攻击卷上有劣势。

items.name: Water Breathing
entries: 巨魔可以在水下呼吸。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Diderius is a 10th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). He has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Dragon Fanatic
entries: The dragonfang has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}. While the dragonfang can see a dragon or higher-ranking Cult of the Dragon cultist friendly to it, the dragonfang ignores the effects of being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Fanatic Advantage
entries: Once per turn, if the dragonfang makes a weapon attack with advantage on the attack roll and hits, the target takes an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage.

trait.name: Limited Flight
entries: 龙方可以使用一个额外的动作来获得30英尺的飞行速度，直到其回合结束。

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The dragonfang has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the dragonfang's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 龙方用它的短剑攻击两次。

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})的穿刺伤害加上7 ({@dice 2d6})龙凤胎有抗性的伤害。

action.name: Orb of Dragon's Breath (2/Day)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5}击中，范围50英尺，一个目标。{@h}22 ({@dice 5d8})龙凤胎有伤害抵抗的类型的伤害。

trait.name: Dragon Fanatic
entries: The dragonsoul has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}. While the dragonsoul can see a dragon or higher-ranking Cult of the Dragon cultist friendly to it, the dragonsoul ignores the effects of being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Fanatic Advantage
entries: Once per turn, if the dragonsoul makes a weapon attack with advantage on the attack roll and hits, the target takes an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage.

trait.name: Limited Flight
entries: 龙魂可以使用一个额外动作来获得30英尺的飞行速度，直到它的回合结束。

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The dragonsoul has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the dragonsoul's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 龙魂用它的短剑攻击了两次。

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})穿刺伤害加上10 ({@dice 3d6})龙魂有抵抗力的类型伤害。

action.name: Orb of Dragon's Breath (3/Day)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7}击中，范围90英尺，一个目标。{@h}27 ({@dice 6d8})龙魂有伤害抵抗的类型的伤害。

items.name: 5etools Note
entries: While Galvan is not presented in an encounter in {@adventure The Rise of Tiamat|RoT}, the {@creature dragonsoul|RoT} stat block has been provided here for ease of use, with optional alterations for the {@item Blue Dragon Mask|RoTOS}.

items.name: Special Equipment
entries: Galvan has the {@item Blue Dragon Mask|RoTOS}.

items.name: Draconic Majesty
entries: While wearing no armor and wearing the Blue Dragon Mask, Galvan adds his Charisma bonus to her AC (included).

items.name: Lingering Shock
entries: If Galvan deals lightning damage to a creature while wearing the Blue Dragon Mask, that creature can't take reactions until its next turn.

items.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If Galvan fails a saving throw while wearing the Blue Dragon Mask, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: 蟾蜍可以呼吸空气或水。

trait.name: Cold Aura
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the toad takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) cold damage.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: 蟾蜍的跳远高度可达20英尺，跳高高度可达10英尺，无论是否有跑步起步。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d8})寒冷伤害。如果目标是中型或小型生物，则是{@condition grappled}(逃逸{@dc 11})。在这个抓取动作结束之前，蟾蜍不能咬住另一个目标。

items.name: 5etools Note
entries: 伊斯坎德在{@adventure The Rise of Tiamat|RoT}中被描述为一个中立的邪恶男性人类巫师。为了方便使用，这里提供了{@creature mage}的状态块。

items.name: 5etools Note
entries: 深红的马卡思在{@adventure The Rise of Tiamat|RoT}中被描述为一个女铁皮人巫师和奥术兄弟会的成员。为了便于使用，这里提供了根据铁弗林种族特征修改的{@creature mage}数据块。

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, Naergoth has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Naergoth可以进行三次攻击，可以用他的长剑或长弓。他可以使用生命耗尽来代替一次长剑攻击。

action.name: Life Drain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}20 ({@damage 5d6 + 3})坏死性伤害。目标必须在{@dc 15}宪法救赎中成功，否则其最大命中率将减少，减少的量等于所受伤害。这种减少持续到目标完成长时间休息。如果这个效果将其最大命中率降低到0，则目标会死亡。

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5})砍击伤害，如果用两只手，则为10 ({@dice 1d10 + 5})，外加10 ({@damage 3d6})坏死伤害。

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5}击中，范围150/600英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1})穿刺伤害加上10 ({@damage 3d6})坏死伤害。

trait.name: Draconic Majesty
entries: Neronvain将他的魅力值加到他的AC上（包括）。

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: 魔法不能让纳隆万入睡。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 尼龙万进行了两次攻击，要么用他的短剑，要么用埃尔德里奇箭。

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})穿刺伤害加上13 ({@damage 3d8})毒药伤害。

action.name: Eldritch Arrow
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7}击中，范围120英尺，一个目标。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d10})武力伤害加上9 ({@damage 2d8})毒药伤害。

action.name: Poisonous Cloud (2/Day)
entries: 毒气充满了一个半径为20英尺的球体，以Neronvain能看到的他周围50英尺内的一个点为中心。毒气在角落里扩散，一直到Neronvain的下一个回合开始。每一个开始在气体中的生物必须在一个{@dc 16}的体质判定中成功，否则就会被{@condition poisoned}，持续1分钟。生物可以在它的每个回合结束时重复蓄力，如果成功则结束对它的影响。

monster.name: Severin
senses: While wearing the Mask of the Dragon Queen: darkvision 60 ft.

resist.preNote: While wearing the mask of the Dragon Queen:

immune.preNote: While wearing the mask of the Dragon Queen:

conditionImmune.preNote: While wearing the mask of the Dragon Queen:

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: 塞弗林有{@item Mask of the Dragon Queen|rot}。

trait.name: Draconic Majesty
entries: Severin将他的魅力值加到他的AC上（包括）。

trait.name: Ignite Enemy
entries: 如果塞弗林在佩戴龙后面具时对一个生物造成火焰伤害，则目标会着火。在它的每个回合开始时，燃烧的目标会受到5({@damage 1d10})的火焰伤害。火灾范围内的生物可以使用一个动作来灭火。

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: 在戴上龙后面具时，如果塞弗林的拯救动作失败，他可以选择成功。

action.name: Burning Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 9}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}18 ({@damage 4d8})火焰伤害。

action.name: Flaming Orb
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 9}击中，范围90英尺，一个目标。{@h}40 ({@damage 9d8})火焰伤害。

action.name: Scorching Burst
entries: 塞弗林选择一个他能看到的点，在他的60英尺范围内。在该点5英尺范围内的每个生物都必须做一个{@dc 17}灵巧的蓄力动作，蓄力失败会受到18({@damage 4d8})的火焰伤害，蓄力成功则受到一半的伤害。
如果塞弗林戴着龙后的面具，他可以采取3个传奇行动，从所列的选项中选择。每次只能使用一个传奇行动选项，而且只能在另一个生物的回合结束时使用。塞弗林在他的回合开始时可以重新获得已使用的传奇行动。

legendary.name: Attack
entries: 塞弗林进行了一次攻击。

legendary.name: Fiery Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Severin, along with any objects he is wearing or carrying, teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space he can see. Each creature within 5 feet of Severin before he teleports takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage.

legendary.name: Hellish Chains (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Severin targets one creature he can see within 30 feet of him. The target is wrapped in magical chains of fire and {@condition restrained}. The {@condition restrained} target takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns. At the end of its turns, the target can make a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

items.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4})的砍击伤害，如果用两只手，则是9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4})的砍击伤害，目标必须进行DC12宪法救赎，救赎失败则受到9 ({@damage 2d8})的毒药伤害，成功则是一半的伤害。

monster.name: Tiamat

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Tiamat can innately cast the following spell, her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 26}):

trait.name: Discorporation
entries: 当提亚马特的命中率降至0或死亡时，她的身体会被摧毁，但她的本质会回到她在九层地狱的领域，而且她在一段时间内无法形成实体。

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: 如果提亚马特的拯救动作失败，她可以选择成功。

trait.name: Limited Magic Immunity
entries: 除非她希望受到影响，否则提亚马特对6级或以下的法术是免疫的。她对所有其他的法术和魔法效果的救赎有优势。

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: 提亚马特的武器攻击是神奇的。

trait.name: Multiple Heads
entries: Tiamat can take one reaction per turn, rather than only one per round. She also has advantage on saving throws against being knocked {@condition unconscious}. If she fails a saving throw against an effect that would stun a creature, one of her unspent legendary actions is spent.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: 提亚马特在她的回合开始时恢复30点生命值。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 提亚马特可以使用她的 "可怕的存在"。然后她进行三次攻击：两次用她的爪子，一次用她的尾巴。

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19}击中，到达15英尺，一个目标。{@h}24 ({@damage 4d6 + 10})砍击伤害。

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19}击中，到达25英尺，一个目标。{@h}28 ({@damage 4d8 + 10})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: 每个在提亚马特240英尺范围内的提亚马特选择的生物，如果知道她的存在，必须在一个{@dc 26}智慧救赎中成功，否则就会变成{@condition frightened}，持续1分钟。一个生物可以在它的每个回合结束时重复这个蓄力动作，如果成功则结束对它的影响。如果一个生物的救赎成功或者效果结束，该生物在接下来的24小时内对提亚马特的恐怖存在免疫。

legendaryHeader: Tiamat can take 5 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Tiamat regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

Tiamat's legendary action options are associated with her five dragon heads (a bite and a breath weapon for each). Once Tiamat chooses a legendary action option for one of her heads, she can't choose another one associated with that head until the start of her next turn.

legendary.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19}击中，到达20英尺，一个目标。{@h}32 ({@damage 4d10 + 10})的砍击伤害加上14 ({@damage 4d6})的酸伤害（黑龙头），雷电伤害（蓝龙头），毒伤害（绿龙头），火伤害（红龙头），或冷伤害（白龙头）。

legendary.name: Black Dragon Head: Acid Breath (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: 提亚马特在10英尺宽的120英尺范围内喷洒酸液。这条线上的每个生物都必须做一个{@dc 27}灵巧的蓄力动作，蓄力失败会受到67({@damage 15d8})的酸液伤害，蓄力成功则受到一半的伤害。

legendary.name: Blue Dragon Head: Lightning Breath (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: 提亚马特在一条10英尺宽的120英尺的线上喷出闪电。这条线上的每个生物都必须做一个{@dc 27}灵巧的蓄力动作，蓄力失败会受到88({@damage 16d10})的闪电伤害，蓄力成功会受到一半的伤害。

legendary.name: Green Dragon Head: Poison Breath (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: 提亚马特在一个90英尺的范围内喷出毒气。该区域内的每个生物都必须做一个{@dc 27}体质判定，如果判定失败，将受到77({@damage 22d6})的毒气伤害，如果判定成功，将受到一半的伤害。

legendary.name: Red Dragon Head: Fire Breath (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: 提亚马特在一个90英尺的圆锥体中喷火。该区域内的每个生物都必须做一个{@dc 27}灵巧的蓄力动作，蓄力失败会受到91({@damage 26d6})的火焰伤害，蓄力成功则受到一半的伤害。

legendary.name: White Dragon Head: Cold Breath (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: 提亚马特在90英尺的范围内喷出一股冰冷的气流。该区域内的每个生物都必须做一个{@dc 27}灵巧的蓄力动作，蓄力失败会受到72({@damage 16d8})的寒冷伤害，蓄力成功则受到一半的伤害。

items.name: 5etools Note
entries: 瓦拉姆在{@adventure The Rise of Tiamat|RoT}中被描述为一个男性矮人。为了便于使用，这里提供了根据矮人种族特征修改的{@creature dragonsoul|RoT}状态块。
